task.title: Add an address
task.shortdesc: Students are asked to regularly verify and update address information on record with the university through the MyPack Portal student information system.

taskbody.prereq: You must have to access to MyPack Portal with your student login credentials.

step.info: Select the link corresponding to the type of information you wish to view from the left-hand navigation menu.

step.cmd: Under the appropriate header (e.g. 'Diploma Address'), select the 'Add Diploma Address' button if no address is defined.
step.info: The button name will vary depending on the type of address you are adding.

step.cmd: Choose how to enter your address information.

choices.choice: Select the 'Copy From' button to copy the address from address that is already on record.
Manually enter an address in the given fields.
